channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 9th May
item.description:
28 day with road closure needed please refresh give way markings appropriately 8 meters best out of hours (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 9th May
item.description:
28day with give and take pothole in carriageway. 600x600x70mm temporary road closure needed with 15 minutes delay boards. Narrow road. Best out of hours. Stats required (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 9th May
item.description:
End of NWD pothole in carriageway. 600x600x70mm temporary road closure needed with 15 minutes delay boards. Narrow road. Best out of hours. (CW6 Pothole)

item.title: Lack of speed limit signs, 9th May
item.description:
The old Evesham Road runs behind our garden and drivers seem to be unaware that it has a 30mph speed limit, drivers assume they can do 60mph because there are no signs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Blackberry Grove, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues
